answers.answer: I'm pregnant with #3 right now and basically never eat cereal when I'm not pregnant but want it all the time when I am. I want all kinds. Sugary, "healthy", etc.
I have two girls. Won't know what this one is until next Monday.
Seriously all I want! I've gone through probably 6 boxes in a week! I also have 2 girls already :)
Awesome! Love my girls but I really want a boy.
I always want cereal lol and I'm having a boy.
Ldkalleck I'm right there with you. Will be so happy for either but hoping for a baby boy.
I've been eating cereal every morning and I'm having a boy

Yup! Cereal is wat I want all the time such a yummy snack! I'm having a girl and am 32 weeks.. Tho I have gestational diabetes so cereal is not reccomended cuz of the carbs but I still sneak a bowl here n there.. Boy I'll tell ya that was a bummer to me..

question: I am craving cereal like crazy! Seriously it's all I want to eat.  All kinds of cereal. Anyone else crave cereal and if so what gender was baby?
title: cravings?
